attributes.action: Make nursery practitioners a priority for the vaccine
attributes.additional_details: I am a nursery practitioner, I'm key worker. Key workers were so essentials at the beginning, what happened? In my room 5/7 people caught covid, including myself. Schools are closed but we are open at full capacity, we are told to have limited contact with others yet we are expected to have contact with a minimum of 20 different families in the baby room alone. Now add all the other families coming in and out of the nursery. All that with no protection. Why? Because we are passionate, Selfless.
attributes.background: I want a petition started for people working in the early years. Nurseries are being kept open to full capacity in the new lockdown whilst everything else, including schools are closed. Yet we are expected to work as normal with minimum protection. We are keyworkers, we need to have protection!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743
